question: Which company join hands with FIFA U17 World Cup Tournament?
explanation: Hyundai India has announced that it will be official transportation partner for the upcoming FIFA U17 World Cup Tournament which starts from October 6, 2017 in India. It will be offering a fleet of 63 premium cars, which includes the recently launched Verna, Tucson and the Elite i20. It will also provide additional coaches across 6 cities namely, Delhi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Kochi, Goa and Guwahati.
